abstract: The Deal Professor examines how Sanofi-Aventis could face a long fight with Genzyme over its hostile bid and how it needs to deal with the Genzyme board.
snippet: The Deal Professor examines how Sanofi-Aventis could face a long fight with Genzyme over its hostile bid and how it needs to deal with the Genzyme board.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis’s hostile bid for Genzyme could be the start of a long fight between the French drug maker and its biotechnology target.

headline.main: What Sanofi Needs to Win Genzyme
